p: In western countries, PVB19 immunization is observed in 5–15% of children aged 1–5 years, who are the main source of the virus transmission, in 50–60% of older children and young adults, and in over 85% in persons older than 70 years [ 12– 14]. Our results (67% in patients with a mean age of 51 years) are consistent with previous data.
